description: Allows to print PDF documents or images from the device. A printer object is always available from tabris.printer.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The bytes of the document to print. The value can either be an ArrayBuffer or a typed array containing the bytes of a PDF document or image.

parameters.name: options

jobName.description: The document name shown the user.

contentType.description: Format of the document. Should be set to `image/*` when printing an image.

parameters.description: An optional set of configuration parameters.

print.description: Prints a PDF document using the native printing capabilities of the device. The data has to be provided as an `ArrayBuffer` or typed array. The method returns a promise which resolves to an event object with the property `result`. The `result` can either be `completed` or `canceled`. When printing fails the promise is rejected with an `Error` parameter containing additional information about the error. Supported on iOS and Android 4.4+.

links.title: How to print a PDF document bundled with an app
